alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts; Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 10:44PM MST until February 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 4000 feet through tonight. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches in the Hualapai Mountains and elevations above 4000 feet in eastern and northern sections of Mohave County. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Plateau and Northwest Deserts. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible on roads above 4000 feet.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
